data.title: Burkina Faso Population ages 65 and above - data, chart
data.meta_description: Burkina Faso: Population ages 65 and above, percent of total: The latest value from 2023 is 2.53 percent, unchanged from 2.53 percent in 2022. In comparison, the world average is 10.12 percent, based on data from 196 countries. Historically, the average for Burkina Faso from 1960 to 2023 is 3.03 percent. The minimum value, 2.53 percent, was reached in 2022 while the maximum of 3.57 percent was recorded in 1983.
